name: Summons
content:
Summons

Name Rank Tags Timing Target Range Check Price Description
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.vgvOWuxi9zpfAQ8N]{Swift Horse Whistle} 1 Summon, Preparation, M2 Instant Self Close None 70

(Fate 1): You are put in the [Riding: Horse] state. (CR11): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.YNHzJHstL4Q8cGv7]{The Loading Whistle} 1 Summon, Preparation, M2 Instant Self Close None 70

(Fate 1): You are put in the [Riding: Llama] state. While in this state, [Inventory] is +6.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.IxMOz7sInv3RzXs9]{Bell Caller} 3 Summon, Preparation, M2 Instant Self Close None 90

(Fate 1): You are put in the [Riding: Owl Bear] state.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.HcAJr4Sj1plTL3gP]{Water Horse's Flute} 3 Summon, Preparation, M2 Instant Self Close None 90

(Fate 1): You are put in the [Riding: Kelpie] state. You gain [Aquatic] tag while in this state.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.TUn57FahE3MieVpi]{Warhorse Whistle} 6 Summon, Preparation, M2 Instant Self Close None 180

(Fate 1): You are put in the [Riding: Warhorse] state.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.YrBExxWXkzz6VLc8]{Yobuko the Wolf} 6 Summon, Preparation, M2 Instant Self Close None 180

(Fate 1): You are put in the [Riding: Direwolf] state.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.iU74In1ea6f4tojX]{Spirit's Ema} 9 Summon, Preparation, M2 Instant Self Close None 310

(Fate 1): You are put in the [Riding: Phase Horse] state.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.JxUDWtL7HmGvRvS2]{Wagon Whistle} 1 Summon, Preparation, M2 Instant Self Close None 45

You are put in the [Riding: Horse-drawn Carriage] state. You can use EX power «Carriage Drive» and «Carriage Armor». (CR16): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.ITtGA6OxD2IqoL76]{Ocarina of Fumio} 1 Summon, Preparation, M2 Instant Self Close None 45

You are put in the [Riding: Passenger Horse] state. You can use EX power «Horse Trot» and «Horse Kick». (CR11): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.Kh6jZV6VTMK382gY]{The Whistle of the Giant Wolf} 1 Summon, Preparation, Rare, M2 Instant Self Close None 45

You are put in the [Riding: Giant Wolf] state. You can use EX power «Beast Dash» and «Drag Fang». (CR11): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.dCuPpTWW67CA5oT0]{Scales of Kelpie} 2 Summon, Preparation, Rare, M2 Instant Self Close None 60

You are put in the [Riding: Kelpie] state. You can use EX power «Horse Trot» and gain [Aquatic] tag. (CR12): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.laT2ygn8hFVC1Hka]{Horn horn Chameleon Flute} 3 Summon, Preparation, Rare, M2 Instant Self Close None 75

You are put in the [Riding: Chameleon] state. You can use EX power «Surprise Attack». (CR10): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.YIKwz9ZKG8MIGrs4]{Giant Ants Whistle} 4 Summon, Preparation, Rare, M2 Instant Self Close None 90

You are put in the [Riding: Giant Ant] state. You can use EX power «Insect Move» and «Grass Hiker». (CR11): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.Xibp8cYZKRguSKX5]{Two-legged Dragon's Fist} 6 Summon, Preparation, Rare, M2 Instant Self Close None 150

You are put in the [Riding: Dinosaur] state. You can use EX power «Sharp Sense» and «Train Dash». (CR16): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.amJEnEmL2R6XPuFC]{Horse Horn} 11 Summon, Preparation, M2 Instant Self Close None 360

You are put in the [Riding: Warhorse] state. You can use EX power «War Trot» and «Horse Kick». (CR21): You gain [Cancel (Attacks from a target not in riding state): 10] during the [Riding: Warhose].
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.bOaRyCI3uAeNkFvQ]{Moon Wolf's Fang} 11 Summon, Preparation, Rare, M2 Instant Self Close None 360

You are put in the [Riding: Giant Wolf] state. You can use EX power «Beast Dash» and «Howling Moon». (CR21): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.WbPCxStGNkuoob8e]{Song of the Sky Dolphin} 12 Summon, Preparation, Rare, M2 Instant Self Close None 450

You are put in the [Riding: Kelpie] state. You can use EX power «Aqua Jet», «Big Wave» and gain the [Aquatic] tag. (CR22): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.MMIXIo5qYDI518q7]{Triangular Chameleon Whistle} 13 Summon, Preparation, Rare, M2 Instant Self Close None 510

You are put in the [Riding: Chameleon] state. You can use EX power «Surprise Attack» and «Beast Dash». (CR20): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.717rbV2Ko8JtCpNE]{Iron Carriage Whistle} 16 Summon, Preparation, M2 Instant Self Close None 750

You are put in the [Riding: Horse-drawn Carriage] state. You can use EX power «Carriage Drive» and «Carriage Armor». Increase the rating of the barrier by «Carriage Armor» by +[INT base]. (CR26): You gain [Cancel (Attacks from a target not in riding state): 10] during the [Riding: Horse-drawn Carriage].
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.lHSp61mOeHzxti99]{Black Biped Dragon's Fist} 16 Summon, Preparation, Rare, M2 Instant Self Close None 750

You are put in the [Riding: Dinosaur] state. You can use EX power «Sharp Sense», «Train Dash» and +1 Sq. (CR26): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.FjOQGsOmFE2Cc6od]{Giant Spider's Whistle} 19 Summon, Preparation, Rare, M2 Instant Self Close None 1000

You are put in the [Riding: Giant Spider] state. You can use EX power «Insect Move» and «Capture Nets». (CR26): You gain [Cancel (Attacks from a target not in riding state): 10] during the [Riding: Giant Spider].
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.jpAuJWPZci5JNyPI]{Snow Gold Wool's Ice Vest} 21 Summon, Preparation, Rare, M2 Instant Self Close None 1200

You are put in the [Riding: Giant Wolf] state. You can use EX power «Grass Hiker», «Beast Dash», and «Howling Moon». [Active: Instant] Can only be used while you are in [Riding: Giant Wolf] state. You gain [Cancel (cold): 20]. This [Cancel] is released immediately when the [Riding: Giant wolf] condition is canceled.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.PPQVFMq43dNZwMKS]{Empty Orca Teeth} 22 Summon, Preparation, Rare, M2 Instant Self Close None 1300

You are put in the [Riding: Kelpie] state. You can use EX power «Aqua Jet», «Ocean Hunter» and gain the [Aquatic] tag.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.summons.T5anxPYVi9Clxbwn]{Sword Two Leg Dragon Horn} 26 Summon, Preparation, Rare, M2 Instant Self Close None 1800

You are put in the [Riding: Dinosaur] state. You can use EX power «Sharp Sense», «Train Dash» and «Force Rush».
